updates.HtmlString: Fixed broken promo and token images.
Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil, includes basic lands, and it always replaces a common.
